title: Mid laners that can also top lane
body: Hey everyone, I know Diana, Ryze, Akali and Nidalee, But what are other champs like this that I can use? I'm quickly seeing that I cannot get mid lane anymore to save my life. So are there any tips Diamond+ people can give me?

replies.body: Cassiopeia was a good pick for a top/mid flex. Not sure how her strength is now, but it could work in your favor with the right matchup/team composition.
Jk for my above post, uhhh someone who can top and mid would be {{champion:59}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:105}}
Lissandra has been freelo for me, damage, utility and a game changing ult, perfect.

Heimerdinger XD
It's not meta and your team will need another fronliner (probably jungle+support, but your mid can become a bruiser too), but the zoning during laning phase is oppressive.
